last_50_posts.content: #Arizona’s ban on ballot-harvesting and out-of-precinct voting does not violate the federal #VotingRightsAct, the #SupremeCourt ruled 6-3 this morning in a closely watched case with implications for future elections. https://www.theepochtimes.com/arizona-ballot-harvesting-ban-is-legal-supreme-court-rules-in-high-stakes-electoral-integrity-case_3882838.html?utm_source=gab

After over 2 months, the #MaricopaAudit moved out of the Veterans Memorial Coliseum in #Phoenix, according to one of the state Senate’s audit liaisons.

2.1 million ballots and voting equipment will be moved to the Wesley Bolin Building on Thursday. https://www.theepochtimes.com/arizona-election-audit-moves-out-of-coliseum-ballots-held-in-new-building-under-24-7-security-official_3882743.html?utm_source=gab

President Biden signed into law a bill overturning a Trump-era #Environmental rule that eased restrictions on methane #Emissions from oil and gas drilling.

Biden called the bill “an important first step of cutting methane pollution.” https://www.theepochtimes.com/biden-revokes-trump-era-rule-that-eased-restrictions-on-methane-emissions_3882684.html?utm_source=gab
